description: Enterprise techniques used by RemoteUtilities, ATT&CK software S0592 v1.0
name: RemoteUtilities (S0592)

techniques.comment: [RemoteUtilities](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0592) can enumerate files and directories on a target machine.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[RemoteUtilities](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0592) can upload and download files to and from a target machine.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[RemoteUtilities](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0592) can take screenshots on a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[RemoteUtilities](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0592) can use Msiexec to install a service.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
